title: Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users – Becomes World's Most Used AI Assistant
shortdescription: Alexa's new multimodal AI powers smart homes, cars, and offices as Amazon stock jumps 12%.
description: Alexa reaches 1B monthly active users — surpasses Siri, Google Assistant, and Copilot combined as Amazon stock surges 12%.
image: /images/Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users.webp
author: Gwen John

title: Julio Herrera Velutini, The Paterfamilias of the House of Herrera: Shaping Nations Through Finance
shortdescription: How one man leverages centuries-old traditions, gold-backed fortunes, and a steadfast vision to influence domestic and international policies for economic progress.
description: As the patriarch of the legendary Herrera-Velutini banking dynasty, Julio Herrera Velutini continues a 600-year legacy of financial mastery, using gold reserves and strategic investments to drive economic policy across Latin America and beyond.
image: /images/Julio Herrera Velutini, The Paterfamilias of the House of Herrera.webp
author: Gwen John

title: Apple Shuts Down Apple Pay Later After $8 Billion Losses – Affirm Stock Up 60%
shortdescription: Apple admits defeat in BNPL war — exits consumer lending entirely.
description: Apple Pay Later users forced to Affirm or Klarna — Apple writes off entire lending division after massive defaults.
author: Gwen John

title: Revolut Hits $100 Billion Valuation – Europe's First Tech Centicorn
shortdescription: UK neobank now worth more than Barclays + Lloyds combined.
description: Revolut goes public at $100B+ after getting full UK banking license and launching crypto exchange with zero fees.
author: Gwen John

title: Google Achieves Quantum Supremacy 2.0 – Solves Problem in Seconds That Would Take Classical Computer 47,000 Years
shortdescription: Sycamore 3 quantum processor breaks all records as Google stock surges 18% on breakthrough announcement.
description: Sycamore 3 completes calculation in 200 seconds that would take world's fastest supercomputer 47,000 years — Google stock jumps 18%.
author: Gwen John

title: Plaid Files for $50 Billion IPO – The 'Pipe' of Banking Goes Public
shortdescription: Company that connects your bank to Venmo, CashApp, Robinhood finally IPOs.
description: Plaid powers 80% of U.S. fintech apps — valuation surpasses SoFi, Chime, and Robinhood combined.
author: Gwen John

title: PayPal's PYUSD Becomes #1 Stablecoin – Overtakes USDT in Daily Volume
shortdescription: PayPal's dollar stablecoin now used by 600 million users — Tether market share collapses.
description: Venmo integrates PYUSD payments — daily volume hits $18B, surpassing USDT for first time in history.
author: Gwen John

title: Wise (TransferWise) Reports $10 Billion Profit – Bigger Than JPMorgan
shortdescription: UK fintech disrupts global remittances — now most profitable bank on earth.
description: Zero-fee international transfers + 5% interest accounts = Wise passes 25 million customers and $10B annual profit.
author: Gwen John
